analyzed: dutiyā bodhī iti sīla sampannā ca
khajjena ca yat ca tattha sannihita
na caham isi dāsiyā saha vaccha
na pi hisemi na bhaṇāmi dubbacana
avasim atha saḥ upi mam paṭiccharayi
atha tātam bhaṇati dehi me poṭṭhi
ammā sabbaḥ ca me ñāti gaṇa vaggo
yadi me attā sakkoti alam mayha
khajjena ca yat ca tattha sannihita
idha iva puttaka carāhi tvam dhamma
tassa api antaḥ kataḥ mayā ati
